    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:e1bd89f2-6e7b-464c-9eba-2370c21a0275</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>e1bd89f2-6e7b-464c-9eba-2370c21a0275</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az őskor és az ókor csillagászata</string>
            <string language="en-US">Prehistoric And Ancient Astronomy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prähistorische Und Alte Astronomie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Astronomie Préhistorique et Antique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Astronomia Pré-histórica E Antiga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Astronomia Prehistoric Ed Antica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προϊστορική και αρχαία αστρονομία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Astronomía Prehistórica Y Antigua</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az őskor és az ókor csillagászata jellemzőinek megismerése, mozgóképek és interaktív elemek segítségével. Kőkörök, Mezopotámia, Egyiptom.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Knowing the Basic Characteristics of the Prehistoric and Ancient Astronomy with help of Motion Pictures and Interactive Elements. Stone Circles, Mesopotamia, Egypt;</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagászat</string>
            <string language="en-US">astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagászattörténet</string>
            <string language="en-US">history of astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">kőkörök</string>
            <string language="en-US">stone circles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Mezopotámia</string>
            <string language="en-US">Mesopotamia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Egyiptom</string>
            <string language="en-US">Egypt</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennen der grundlegenden Eigenschaften der 
prähistorischen und alten Astronomie mit Hilfe der Bewegung 
Abbildungen und der interaktiven Elemente. Steinkreise, 
Mesopotamia, Ägypten;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Savoir les caractéristiques de base de 
l'astronomie préhistorique et antique avec l'aide des films 
cinématographiques et des éléments interactifs. Cercles En 
pierre, Mesopotamia, Egypte ;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sabendo as características básicas da 
astronomia pré-histórica e antiga com ajuda de retratos de movimento
e de elementos interativos. Círculos De pedra, Mesopotamia, 
Egipto;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conoscere le caratteristiche di base 
dell'astronomia prehistoric ed antica con aiuto del cinema e degli 
elementi interattivi. Cerchi Di pietra, Mesopotamia, Egitto;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γνώση των βασικών χαρακτηριστικών της προϊστορικής 
και αρχαίας αστρονομίας με τις οδηγίες των ταινιών και των 
διαλογικών στοιχείων. Κύκλοι πετρών, Μεσοποταμία, Αίγυπτος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Saber las características básicas de la 
astronomía prehistórica y antigua con la ayuda de las películas y 
de los elementos interactivos. Círculos De piedra, Mesopotamia,
Egipto;</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte von Astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steinkreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mesopotamia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ägypten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire d'astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cercles en pierre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesopotamia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Egypte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history da astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mesopotamia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Egipto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mesopotamia</string>
